title: The Ex Who Won't Let Go

nodes.title: The Midnight Text
nodes.story: It's 2 AM. Your phone buzzes with a message from a number you haven't deleted but should have. 'I can't sleep. I keep thinking about us. Can we talk?' Your heart skips a beat despite your better judgment.

choices.text: Ignore it and go back to sleep
Reply: 'It's late. We shouldn't do this.'
Reply: 'I miss you too. What do you want to talk about?'

nodes.title: The Morning After
nodes.story: You wake up to 7 missed calls and 12 texts. 'Please just answer. I need to see you. I drove past your place last night.' They're parked outside your apartment right now.

choices.text: Call the police
Go outside and confront them
Pretend you're not home

nodes.title: The Phone Call
nodes.story: They call immediately after your reply. 'Please, just hear me out. I've changed. I'm seeing a therapist. I realize what I lost.' Their voice cracks in that familiar way that used to melt your heart.

choices.text: Hang up and block the number
Agree to meet for coffee tomorrow
Tell them you're seeing someone new

nodes.title: Old Flames
nodes.story: They show up at your door 20 minutes later. 'I couldn't wait.' They pull you into a hug that feels like home and danger all at once. Their lips find yours before you can protest.

choices.text: Push them away firmly
Kiss them back, just for a moment
Let them in but keep your distance

nodes.title: Parking Lot Confrontation
nodes.story: They're leaning against their car, looking exhausted. 'I haven't slept in days thinking about you.' They reach for your hand. 'One more chance. That's all I'm asking.'

choices.text: Slap their hand away
Take their hand, tears in your eyes
Get in your car and drive away

nodes.title: The Wait
nodes.story: You watch from your window as they sit in their car for three hours. Finally, they get out and leave a package on your doorstep. It's the necklace they gave you on your first anniversary.

choices.text: Throw it in the trash
Put it on, feeling nostalgic
Mail it back with a final letter

nodes.title: The Coffee Date
nodes.story: At the cafe, they look better than you remember. 'I've really changed,' they say, showing you therapy notes. The old chemistry is still there, buzzing between you.

choices.text: Say you're happy for them but leave
Agree to a proper dinner date
Kiss them across the table

nodes.title: Jealousy Unleashed
nodes.story: 'Who is it?' Their voice turns cold. 'Tell me who you're with.' The calm facade shatters. This is the person you remember.

choices.text: Lie to de-escalate
Tell them it's none of their business
Make up a fake partner's name

nodes.title: Back in the Bedroom
nodes.story: Old sheets, familiar smells. Their hands know every curve of your body. 'I never stopped loving you,' they whisper as you fall back into old patterns.

choices.text: This feels wrong - stop and leave
Surrender to the moment completely
Ask what this means for tomorrow

nodes.title: Breaking Free
nodes.story: You make the final break. Blocked numbers, deleted photos, returned items. It hurts like hell, but for the first time in months, you breathe freely.

choices.text: Start fresh

nodes.title: The Cycle Continues
nodes.story: You're back together. The love bombing lasts a week before the old patterns return. The texts stop, the excuses begin. You're exactly where you were a year ago.

choices.text: Accept this is your life now

nodes.title: Uncertain Future
nodes.story: 'Let's take it slow,' they say. But 'slow' means texting constantly and checking in. You're not sure if this is progress or a new kind of trap.

choices.text: See where this goes
